                                  java.io.File zipFilePath,
                                  MissionPackageContent content)
        Extract fileName from zipFile into targetDirectory
        Parameters:
        manifest - the manifest for the data package
        zipFilePath - the file that is the data package
        content - the content to extract associated with the data package
        Returns:

      • ExtractCoT

        public static java.lang.String ExtractCoT​(java.io.File zipFilePath,
                                          MissionPackageManifest manifest,
                                          MissionPackageContent content,
                                          boolean broadcast)
        Extract CoT UID from zipFile, optionally broadcast CoT for internal processing by ATAK
        Parameters:
        zipFilePath - the mission package path
        manifest - the manifest, if supplied can be used to extract files relative to the manifest location.
        content - the content of the mission package
        Returns:
        null upon error
